fields.name: Standing Poses
fields.description: A collection of standing asanas that develop balance, grounding, and strength.
fields.benefits: Improves balance, stability, and overall alignment.

fields.name: Forward Bends
fields.description: Asanas that stretch the posterior chain and calm the mind.
fields.benefits: Reduces stress, lengthens spine, improves digestion.

fields.name: Backbends
fields.description: Heart-opening poses that strengthen the spine.
fields.benefits: Improves spinal mobility and boosts energy.

fields.name: Balance Poses
fields.description: Poses that enhance focus and stability.

fields.name: Restorative Poses
fields.benefits: Calms the nervous system and restores energy.
